casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CLEVELAND
v.
RUSSO 2019-0251 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 19, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MISCELLANEOUS ORDERS

In Prohibition. Respondent shall file a response to the complaint, the motion for stay, and the motion to expedite the briefing schedule no later than Friday, February 22, 2019. Relator shall have three days from the date of filing to respond to any responsive motion filed by respondent.
